query:
{
  materialsWithMeta(customer: '0000002810', shipToCustomer: '0000002810', salesOrganisation: '2800', plants: [], language: 'M', pickAndPack: $pickAndPack, orderBy: $orderBy, first: 11, after: 0) {
    rawMetaData {
      type
      count
      __typename
    }
    materials {
      materialNumber
      materialDescription
      principalCode
      principalName
      therapeuticClass
      governmentMaterialCode
      genericMaterialName
      defaultMaterialDescription
      oldMaterialCode
      materialGroup4
      materialGroup2
      taxClassification
      itemRegistrationNumber
      taxM1
      taxes
      unitOfMeasurement
      hidePrice
      hasValidTenderContract
      hasMandatoryTenderContract
      isSampleMaterial
      isFOCMaterial
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
